creator: shawn.yang@silkworld.com
text:
When running ImportAttribute.jsp (sample code from Ch.11 - Core Servlets and 
JSP by Marty Hall), the code works fine on Tomcat 4.1.18, but not on 4.1.24.  
Source code of associated files can be found on the book companion site.  I've 
tried repeatedly and couldn't figure out why the code fails to work in 4.1.24.

creator: funkman@joedog.org
text: Tried and it works fine with 4.1.24 for me.

Yes, the script runs.  But it doesn't write to the cookie file in 4.1.24.  
However, the same setup in 4.1.18 writes the cookie file without a glitch.  I 
can't pinpoint what's the variant.
creator: shawn.yang@silkworld.com

text:
Writes the cookie file? Tomcat does not write a cookie file. It sounds like a
broken web browser. I have tested this jsp on 4.1.24 and the jsp worked
correctly. It set the cookie on first hit and found the cookie on subsequent
reloads.
creator: funkman@joedog.org

text:
Thanks for testing.  Tried both IE and Netscape browsers, same results.  What 
baffles me is why the same script works for me on 4.1.18, but not on 4.1.24.  
Not a single change was made to the code.  I will take this offline and look 
for an answer.
creator: shawn.yang@silkworld.com
